discourse_list.title: EIP-6229: Tokenized Vaults with Lock-in Period

content.content: Hi ethereum magicians! We are proposing a new EIP:  EIP Proposal: Tokenized Vaults with Lock-in Period  Description: This standard is an extension of the EIP-4626 Tokenized Vaults that provides functions to support the lock-in period. Stage: draft Relate EIPs: EIP-4626 Tokenized Vaults   Please see the pull request in details:  github.com/ethereum/EIPs         EIP-6229: Tokenized Vaults with Lock-in Period   ethereum:master ← Ankarrr:eip-draft-tokenized-vault-with-lock-in-period              opened 06:42AM - 28 Dec 22 UTC                 Ankarrr               +335 -0       This draft EIP is an extension of the EIP-4626 Tokenized Vaults that provides fu…nctions to support the lock-in period.  I used the suggested template: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/eip-template.md       This proposal is in the draft stage. Any comments and feedback are very welcome and appreciated!
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is proposing a new EIP, EIP-6229, which is an extension of EIP-4626 Tokenized Vaults that provides functions to support the lock-in period. The proposal is in the draft stage, and the author is asking for comments and feedback. The post does not advertise the proposal, nor does it contain entirely positive or negative feedback.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: According to feedback, I’m considering removing the VaultStates to avoid using Enum, and use a boolean to represent the vault’s state. This will be more developer friendly to integrate the vault. Proposed changes:  Remove VaultStates  Change state to locked. The specs of locked is described below.   locked The current state of the vault. True means LOCKED, and False means UNLOCKED. - name: state   type: boolean   stateMutability: view    inputs: []    outputs:     - name: state       type: boolean
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
